title: FULL RENOVATION 2/1  $2350 yearly PET OK
posting_body: ['New construction!', 'No association Fabulous two bedroom one bathroom.', 'Building just recently completed an extensive renovation including new electrical wiring, plumbing, brand new laminate flooring, contemporary wood  baseboards, solid wooden cabinets.', 'Brand NewcAppliances, granite kitchen countertops .', 'Access code gated community.', 'Hurricane IMPAC windows.', 'Full window treatments Laundry on premises.', 'Pet friendly community welcomes large pets (possible breed restriction.', 'No aggressive breeds please).', '2 parking spaces.', 'Across from Gulf Stream race track￼.', '$2350month yearly lease first and 2 months security.', 'With renewal option.', 'Rapid Approval.', 'Qualified applicants please .', 'Required to view our copy of ID last two paystub‘s, most recent bank statement.', 'Application and backround check required.', 'Showing only to demonstrable qualified tenant please.', 'Call Brian Morgenstern agent Beachfront Realty', 'show contact info']
